mets:xmlData.dc:description: Ceremonies honoring the City of San Mateo, California. (l to r) Mayor Hugh A. Wayne, San Mateo; LTG Stanley R. Larsen, Commanding General, Sixth US Army, Presidio of San Francisco, California; EG Thomas K. Turnage, Representative of Governor Ronald Reagan's Sacramento, California, Office; Mrs. Barbara Schroeder, Chairman, Screaming Eagles Committee; and Mrs. Linda (Giese) Patterson, Founder of the Screaming Eagles Committee, and Maj. P.E. Vallely, ROES to LTG Larsen. 6 Oct 69. Photographer SF5 Stephan Roeshink, Sixth US Army Central Photo Facility, Presidio of San Francisco, California. Official US Army Photograph 5058-3909-7/AM 69
